Text: Puget SoundHi Frank Just thought Id send you an email to give you the details we discussed today We bought mmbtu from Puget Sound in May at Kingsgate They seem to think that they bought partmost of that gas back from us at Kingsgate However I do not see a deal showing this purchase from Puget Can you ck to see if you did in fact sell this gas back to Puget The sitara of the purchase from Puget is Let me know if you need anything else from me Your prompt attention to this matter would be greatly appreciated Thanks Darla Saucier

Re New Power Companynot a short pay that I am concerned with They are a netout customer They only billed us for We show that we owe them I thought that you were checking on a buysale that was supposed to cancel off some of this payable amount They paid us which is the net of what they owed us and what they think we owed them Call if that doesnt make sense Darla Chris CT PM To Darla NRON cc Subject Re New Power Company Do you have a total dollar amount that New Power paid for Oct production According to David Scott at New Power they did not make any adjustments to the bill He said they may not have received all of the bill there might have been some Michcon activity missing Darla NRON AM To Chris CT cc Subject New Power Company Hi Chris Please give me a call this afternoon and let me know if youve had a chance to look over the deals for october that Mary Ellenberger emailed to you last week I would like to get this matter resolved this week Thanks Darla

Re Production New Powerit does Thank you very much Enron North America Corp From Chris Germany ECT AM To Darla NRON cc Subject Re Production New Power Looky at what I just opened in my email I had some stuff tucked away in a different directory and Im going thru it now Does this still need to be addressed Darla NRON PM To Chris CT cc Subject Production New Power Hey Chris Does this amount look correct to you Do we actually owe New Power MM they havent mentioned it to me but its showing up as a balance due to them could you please verify ASAP Thanks

New Power CompanyChris Please give me a call this afternoon and let me know if youve had a chance to look over the deals for october that Mary Ellenberger emailed to you last week I would like to get this matter resolved this week Thanks Darla
Re Oglethorpea note I require animal crackers every day for breakfast Keep that in mindit is a must Ha Ha

Re OglethorpeChris Did you ever get an answer on this Chris CT PM To Beverly CT Clarissa CT Robert CT cc Darla nron Sherry CT Subject Re Oglethorpe Hey gang Attached is the maualy invoice for Oglethorpe I have fixed the pricing and the volumes on the top part of deal to match the maual invoice Can we adjust the expected volumes in Sitara to match the manual invoice If yes how do you balance Unify since these are deal volumes and not actual flow volumes AND Sherri how this be entered from the accounting side in Unify since scheduling vs actual flow vs billing are all different Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on PM Darla NRON PM To Chris CT cc Subject Re Oglethorpe Can the Sitara ticket be updated to match this invoice
Re OglethorpeChris Let me know if you need anything from me Id like to attend if you do schedule a meeting
Oglethorpe send me an invoice for Jan Thanks Forwarded by Darla SaucierNAEnron on PM Darla Saucier PM To Chris CT cc Subject Oglethorpe Hi Chris I need an invoice for Oglethorpe for dec Thanks

FW DoyleWill you let me know when youre done with Oglethorpe Original Message From Gilbert Gerald Sent Wednesday June PM To Saucier Darla Subject FW Doyle Original Message From Homco Jim Sent Wednesday June PM To Gilbert Gerald Subject FW doyle We agree with the invoice except for the the st On that day we bought mms and Chis will be putting in the deal By the way Im Gerald and I will doing Jims stuff starting on the th on this month GG
OglethorpeIs this invoice ready to go yet I need to know ASAP My system will be shut down today until Monday I need to get this out today Thanks Darla
Hey Dont worry about that sales stuff I think I got it Thanks Darla
Call meCan you call me when youre done trading Thanks

FW December Sales Cc Heres NPs deals for Dec These are the deals they think we owed them that we dont seem to show in our system Please ck to see if these look like good deals to you and if they are do you have sitara s Thanks Darla Original Message From Miceli Cris Sent Tuesday October AM To Saucier Darla Subject December Sales

OglethorpeHey guys Would you please ck the Oglethorpe deal from July Dec Is there supposed to be a cashout booked in Sitara for these months Oglethorpe over paid their invoice every month I believe that Doug told me the extra was for the cashout that was not invoiced Thanks Darla

FW Colorado Aug FileOriginal Message From Staab Theresa Sent Monday October PM To Saucier Darla Subject FW Colorado Aug File Darla Here is Citizens for August I will get your December questions answered ASAP PSCO Transportation x x Sub Total PSCO CIG North Pricing x South Pricing Fixed x South Pricing Index x Trans Credit x rd Party Credit Sub Total CIG TOTAL Call me if you have any questions Thanks Theresa Note In August we have made the correction to reduce the Citizens volume by the LGSWoodward deliveries to White Rock FYI Original Message From Lipke Craig mailto Sent Friday October AM To Theresa Staab Email Subject Colorado Aug File Here it is again Craig W Lipke Citizens Energy Supply Phone Fax Cell This email and any files transmitted with it from Citizens Communication Co are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed Any other use is expressly prohibited If you have received this email in error please notify the sender immediately
Citizens Dec Can you please provide support for the that Nicole gave me to bill Citizens for CIG in Dec I billed a volume of Thanks Darla

QC Sitara Ellis said I should forward this to you Please advise Forwarded by Darla SaucierNAEnron on AM Darla Saucier AM To Jerry NRON cc Subject QC Sitara National Fuel Marketing is invoicing us for penalty charges for the month of Dec on the above referenced deal They say that they were cut on the firms deliveries by mmbtu on El Paso Pipeline The penalties they have calculated amount to I have a letter from them if you need a fax copy Please let me know if you agree with this penalty charge See info below Call me if you have any questions at X Thanks Darla Saucier Client Services

Sierra PacificHi Jane According to my contact at Sierra PacificNevada Power the deals youre doing with them should be with Nevada Power not Sierra Pacific For Sept the deal s I see are and Is there any reason why we cant change the counterparty name in Sitara to Nevada Power Thanks Darla Saucier x

RE Sierra PacificThanks I saw your name in Sitara Sorry for the mix up Original Message From Tholt Jane M Sent Friday October AM To Saucier Darla Subject RE Sierra Pacific I have not done any deals with Sierra Pacific but will pass on to Steve South Original Message From Saucier Darla Sent Thursday October PM To Tholt Jane M Subject Sierra Pacific Hi Jane According to my contact at Sierra PacificNevada Power the deals youre doing with them should be with Nevada Power not Sierra Pacific For Sept the deal s I see are and Is there any reason why we cant change the counterparty name in Sitara to Nevada Power Thanks Darla Saucier x

REHey Kim Please contact Megan Parker from now on for Citizens I will be helping transition this off to her but most of the activity needs to be addressed with her Thanks Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Thursday November PM To Saucier Darla Subject darla can you send me the invoice for the griffith stuff for July I think I need to make a change Thanks Kim

Citizens Cc houston Hi Just wanted to get an update from you on the Citizens info I asked you about last week I am wondering about the payment to John Cogan for Aug production and the EAMR payment due Did you talk to Sarabeth about that Thanks Darla

RE CitizensAnne Bike is supposed to ck that out I am not the one to pay that invoice Thanks for the update on the other Darla Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Thursday October AM To Saucier Darla Subject RE Citizens I am back in the office we are having a conference call this afternoon to iron out the last calculation questions and you will get a final spreadsheet for August and September from Mara Bronstein I have not talked to Sarabeth as you have the only copy of the invoice that I had Have you talked to Bryce about that invoice What do you guys need in order to pay them Thanks Kim Original Message From Saucier Darla Sent Tuesday October PM To Bike Anne Cc Ward Kim S Houston Subject Citizens Hi Just wanted to get an update from you on the Citizens info I asked you about last week I am wondering about the payment to John Cogan for Aug production and the EAMR payment due Did you talk to Sarabeth about that Thanks Darla

RE CitizensHi Kim I am ready to invoice Citizens for September Do you have the Griffith sheet ready yet Thanks Darla Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Thursday October AM To Saucier Darla Subject RE Citizens I am back in the office we are having a conference call this afternoon to iron out the last calculation questions and you will get a final spreadsheet for August and September from Mara Bronstein I have not talked to Sarabeth as you have the only copy of the invoice that I had Have you talked to Bryce about that invoice What do you guys need in order to pay them Thanks Kim Original Message From Saucier Darla Sent Tuesday October PM To Bike Anne Cc Ward Kim S Houston Subject Citizens Hi Just wanted to get an update from you on the Citizens info I asked you about last week I am wondering about the payment to John Cogan for Aug production and the EAMR payment due Did you talk to Sarabeth about that Thanks Darla
